DOC.brief_summary: A significant number patient experience postoperative cognitive change follow total joint arthroplasty . Among cause , mental status change may result fat bone marrow debris embolization . We hypothesize use computer assist total knee arthroplasty , utilize intramedullary alignment rod , would produce less fat bone marrow debris embolization , hence , few mental status change .
DOC.brief_title: Cognition Following Computer Assisted Total Knee Arthroplasty
